entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thundershower this morning. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Snow inland overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
